duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop a clear vision for the team and execute on a strategy to ensure the team hits or exceeds its revenue targets each year.
Lead a team of Account Managers and Recruiters, ensuring recruitment and AM metrics are meeting company assigned placement goals.
Advise recruiters and Account Managers on best practices and strategies for clinicians and clients.
Establish and maintain effective working relationships with business development, other divisions, Company associates, and with management.
Coordinate with internal marketing department regarding specific and general recruitment and account management communication or strategy.
Attend meetings, trainings, client visits, and company events as required.

education_certification.credential: BS in a business-related field or equivalent work related experience. Healthcare industry experience highly desired. Executive leadership experience.
